attributes.background: Peta, are currently approaching schools directly to make presentations about animals to school children without the parents permission. They are targeting children as young as 5 yrs old with offers of free books and presentation packs for their friends. Our children do not need indoctrinating.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because deciding what teaching materials to use is the responsibility of schools and not the UK Government or Parliament.
